title: Has anyone hit honor  3 yet?
body: just wondering, cause i have been honored literally every game aha still no sign of seeing it

replies.body:
I know of a couple of people but they play league for 10+ hours a day. 

[In the words of Tomblade](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/zO7tAHQ8-random-question-about-honor?comment=0000) - "There's no fixed amount of honours you need to receive in order to go up a rank. The only intended way to rank up is to genuinely be a good person in the game - not about points, not about score but just about being a sportsmanlike person all the time."

Stop worrying about your honor level and just focus on being a good person.
